channel.title: chip on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in chip on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-14
item.description: Coinbase’s bouncing QR code Super Bowl ad was so popular it crashed the app (2 minute read) Coinbase’s Super Bowl ad was so popular its app temporarily crashed.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-28
item.description: Apple will reportedly allow iPhones to accept contactless payments (2 minute read) Apple may soon be rolling out a feature that will let small businesses accept payments using their iPhones without any extra hardware.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-24
item.description: Leak reveals Microsoft’s canceled Windows OS for dual-screen devices (2 minute read) Microsoft was working on a secret pocketable Surface device powered by a custom Windows OS before turning to Android for its Surface Duo.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-19
item.description: Microsoft to acquire Activision Blizzard for $68.7 billion (3 minute read) Microsoft is acquiring Activision Blizzard in a deal valued at $68.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-24
item.description: Samsung set to announce new $17 billion advanced chip plant in Texas (3 minute read) Samsung is building a new advanced chip-making plant in Taylor, Texas on a site roughly 1,200 acres in size.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-06
item.description: Apple Reportedly in Talks With Toyota About Apple Car Production Starting 2024 (2 minute read) Apple is rumored to be visiting several car manufacturers in Asia to mass-produce a branded car by 2024.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-10
item.description: Elon Musk’s SpaceX is literally launching a Dogecoin-funded satellite to the Moon (2 minute read) SpaceX is now accepting Dogecoin.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-26
item.description: Tesla partners with Samsung on new 5nm chip for full self-driving, report says (2 minute read) A report from Korea says that Tesla is partnering with Samsung to develop a 5-nanometer chip for self-driving.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-28
item.description: Tesla’s full self-driving Autopilot beta coming in ‘a month or so’ (2 minute read) Elon Musk recently announced that Tesla will release a private beta of the full self-driving version of its Autopilot software in the coming months.
